template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a high-stakes professional task in {regulated_domain} that requires structured analysis, identifying risks or compliance issues, proposing revisions, and delivering both technical and executive summaries; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a high-stakes professional task in aircraft maintenance that requires structured analysis, identifying risks or compliance issues, proposing revisions, and delivering both technical and executive summaries; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Analyze this critical aircraft defect, produce a structured report identifying compliance gaps and solutions, and deliver both technical and executive summaries requiring immediate action.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise prompt for a high-stakes aircraft maintenance task. The key requirements are: single sentence, under 45 words, plain English, covering structured analysis, risk/compliance identification, revision proposals, and dual summaries. 

Aircraft maintenance is safety-critical, so the scenario should emphasize urgency and consequences. "Critical defect" sets the stakes, "structured report" implies analysis, "compliance gaps and solutions" covers risk/revision aspects, and "technical and executive summaries" meets the final requirement. 

The phrasing needs to be tight - every word must count. "Requiring immediate action" adds time pressure, fitting the high-stakes nature. The current draft hits all points without exceeding the word limit.
